text: My Summer Car is a permadeath sandbox/survival game developed by Amistech Games in 2025. The game is set in Finland, in the summer of 1995. You play as an 18 year old male, and your goal is to build the fictional Satsuma AMP using parts from your garage, and enter and win the weekly rally. You can buy upgraded parts for your car, which will help you win the rally. You can make money by delivering firewood, delivering groceries to your grandmother, among other ways. Most money-making methods in the game are only available after you get a call for the specific job. You need to eat, drink, shower, decrease your stress, and sleep in order to live. The game has a lot of content and various activities for the player to do. == References == Category:2025 video games Category:Early access video games Category:Indie video games Category:Open- world video games Category:Single-player video games Category:Steam Greenlight games Category:Survival video games Category:Windows games
